src_original: evaṃ śrotrâdiṣu vācyaṃ /  tena pratyekam indriyaṣaṭkena saumanasyâditrayāṇāṃ-
tgt_original: 如是六根各各緣彼適悅等三，是名十八意所伺察。

src_original: katamaś ca mahārājâdhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
tgt_original: 云何為內地界？

src_original: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatam upāttaṃ /  tat punaḥ katamat /  tad yathā /  keśā romāṇi nakhā dantêty ādi /
tgt_original: 謂於內身所生硬澁，髮毛爪齒，皮肉筋骨。

src_original: ayam ucyate ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ //  katamaś ca mahārāja bāhyaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /  yat kiñcid bāhyaṃ kakkhaṭvaṃ kharagatam anupāttam ayam ucyate bāhyaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /  tatra mahārājâdhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno*na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 若內地界不生，亦無有滅，則無集行。

src_original: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo
tgt_original: 大王！

src_original: yat strī adhyātmam ahaṃ strîti kalpayati /  sâdhyātmam ahaṃ strîti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣêti kalpayati /  sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣêti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogam ākāṅkṣate /
tgt_original: 若時女人，而於內心如所思惟彼補嚕沙，彼補嚕沙亦生愛樂，由二和合羯邏藍生。

src_original: puruṣo 'dhyātmaṃ puruṣo 'smîti kalpayatîti pūrvavat /  tayoḥ saṃyogâkāṅkṣayā saṃyogo bhavati /  saṃyogapratyayāt kalalaṃ jāyate /  tatra mahārāja yaś ca saṃkalpo yaś ca saṃkalpayitā /
tgt_original: 又復思惟相似和合，而得生者，無有是處；

src_original: ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate /  striyāṃ strī na saṃvidyate /  puruṣe puruṣo na saṃvidyate /
tgt_original: 若二女人，無有是處； 二補嚕沙，亦無是處；

src_original: iti hy asann asadbhūtaḥ saṃkalpo jātaḥ /  so 'pi saṃkalpāsvabhāvena na saṃvidyate /  yathā saṃkalpas tathā saṃyogo 'pi kalalam api svabhāvena na saṃvidyate /
tgt_original: 若彼彼思惟而得生者，亦無是處。 自體無實，非相應故。

src_original: yaś ca svabhāvato na saṃvidyate tat kathaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ janayiṣyati /
tgt_original: 云何說此為堅硬性？
